title: CSV Import
description: Import trading history from Hero Global CSV files.

importType.title: Import Type
importType.appendDesc: Keep existing data and add new trades only.
importType.fullDesc: Delete all data and start fresh.

fileUpload.title: Select CSV File
fileUpload.dragText: Click or drag file to upload
fileUpload.hint: Only CSV files downloaded from Hero Global are supported.

error.enterAssets: Please enter current total assets for full reset import.

success.importComplete: Import complete: {{savedTrades}} trades saved, {{skippedTrades}} duplicates skipped / {{savedPositions}} positions saved, {{skippedPositions}} duplicates skipped
